sub_title: Creating sustainable marcomms strategies | Tech & Sustainability Marketer
summary:
I am a sustainability transition marketing & communications professional with over 8 years of practical background in impact-driven corporate and non-profit environments with B2B, B2G and B2C businesses. I love translating challenging tech & sustainable projects into strategies that move to change. My driving force is accelerating success of businesses that bring a difference for our people & planet. 

Proven record in building marketing and communication strategies, managing projects, nurturing community & stakeholder management, organising high-level events and implementing brand & product strategies. My secret power is to inspire my colleagues to achieve their best through my passion and unprecedented business ethics. 

𝐅𝐢𝐞𝐥𝐝𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐄𝐱𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐬𝐞:
• Marketing Strategy & Impact Marketing
• Sustainable Communications & Storytelling
• Brand Building 
• Stakeholder Management 
• Event Management 
• Digital Marketing 
• Project Management
• Consumer Behaviour & Behavioural Psychology   
• CSR

Interests: technology, circular economy, renewables, cleantech, mobility, SDGs (Sustainable Development Goals), robotics, women's leadership, arts, archeology.

𝐇𝐨𝐰 𝐈 𝐝𝐨 𝐢𝐭:
🧑🏻‍🤝‍🧑🏿 🌳 🌍 I believe that the best marcomms strategies employ powerful stories and trigger systemic changes. I create such strategies using my creativity and behavioural psychology expertise.

🤝 The way to success is through cooperation, not rivalry. I love building partnerships that create innovative infrastructures, radically changing how we operate as a society.

✊ 👩 👴🏾 My goal is to empower individuals, communities, and companies in their sustainable choices. Companies benefit from the plurality of experiences and create more resilient & fair strategies.


𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐫𝐚𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐫𝐢𝐜𝐮𝐥𝐚𝐫 𝐀𝐜𝐡𝐢𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬:
• EU Climate Pact Ambassador (2021/2022)
• Co-author “We Have a Dream” book, Ambassador for Czechia, One Young World (2021)
• Guiltless Plastic Competition: Finalist, Rossana Orlandi Design Studio (2020)
• Milano Design Week: Exhibitor (2020)

I speak 🇳🇱 Dutch (B2), 🇬🇧 English (C2), 🇨🇿 Czech (native), and 🇷🇺 Russian (B2).

Interested in cooperation?
Drop me a message directly here at Linkedin.

treasury_media.title: GET: Green Effective Tube
treasury_media.description: One billion toothpaste tubes are thrown out each year. Toothpaste tubes are unrecyclable and polluting. But people won’t stopbrushing their teeth. Between 1994 and 2010 in most of the countries this number rose from 30–62% to 50–72%. A fully...

treasury_media.title: GET: the toothpaste tube saving the planet
treasury_media.description:
GET: Green Effective Tube is a design solution for plastic pollution, saving 1 billion toothpaste tubes from the dumpster annually. We took the disruptive marketing approach, dived deep into the behavioral research, and came up with a circular solution, based on reusability.

GET is a toothpaste tube changing the toothbrushing habits to a minimally possible extent, bringing a solution that is viable not only for a sustainable bubble but for the broad society.

projects.title: Sustain-ABILITY Team Utrecht
projects.description: What does it mean to "act sustainably"? Why is nature protection important to us? Different generations - different opinions. Many times the best leaders could learn a lesson from the smallest kids. Together with the team of Utrecht-based sustainability specialists, I have designed, conducted, and pitched the case for the Ellen MacArthur foundation festival, where we raised the topic of intergenerational cooperation and its importance for nature protection.

profile_positions.description:
I am creating sustainable communication & marketing strategy that bring success to my clients and positive change to people & the planet. I help businesses to define their purpose, craft their narrative through strategic marketing communications and brand touchpoints using insights from consumer behaviour and psychology.

Thanks to the collaboration with a wide portfolio of business clients (Action, Expansion.eco, Greenterprise), think tanks, governments (EU, EC), and both multinational & small NGOs (European Climate Foundation, Ellen MacArthur Foundation, Friends of the Earth, City Changers) I gained experience in sustainability psychology and its community practice which helps to profile my clients as thought sustainable leaders in their fields & achieve a business success in a sustainable way.
profile_positions.title: Sustainability & Tech Marketer

profile_positions.description:
Circle Economy is a global impact organization that connects and empowers a global community to create the conditions for systemic transformation towards just & sustainable world. It works alongside businesses, cities and governments to identify opportunities to make the transition to a circular economy and provide practical and scalable solutions to turn those opportunities into reality.

- I create communication strategies bringing new leads and the relevant user following to the brand, and campaigns tailored for our clients that help promote their sustainable efforts. 
- Responsible for client ATL & BTL communication plans (strategy development & execution).
- Developed and executed the launch of the Circularity Gap Report Comms campaign (SoMe, SEM, event management) which generated more than 7 million unique views, and generated +7 new leads cost-efficiently.
- Increased the organic following SoMe basis by 30%. 
- Manage Event Marketing & Management (organised the in-house & incoming events and speaking endeavours, including screening of the Going Circular documentary for 300+ C-level stakeholders).
profile_positions.title: Communications Specialist

profile_positions.description: European Climate Pact Ambassadors are individuals committed to informing, inspiring and supporting climate action in their communities and networks in contribution to the European Climate Pact. Ambassadors are volunteers who act in their personal capacity or in their professional capacity representing their organisation.
profile_positions.title: European Climate Pact Ambassador

profile_positions.description:
Talent.eco is a business platform connecting green (tech) companies to valuable partners from the business, investor, NGO, and policy-making world.

Responsible for New Business Management & Strategic Advice to Green Businesses.
profile_positions.title: Communication Consultant for the Green Economy in Europe

profile_positions.description:
Disruptive branding studio focusing on the creation of a meaningful business environment through branding and marketing strategy. 

I've created & implemented marketing strategies and branding on sustainability topics, employed consumer psychology & behaviour to achieve long-term success and data-driven results. I have been responsible for project & stakeholder management to various commercial & non-profit projects, focused on innovation, technology and sustainability in PR, marketing, storytelling and communications.

Created GET, Green Effective Tube that was exhibited at Milano Design Week and listed into finals in Guiltless Plastic design competition held by Rossana Orlandi & in Brno Design Week. 

GET (Green Effective Tube) is a solution to the struggle of the rising need for sustainable solutions, and our inability to employ them in our everyday life. The design is changing the behavioural pattern of toothbrushing as minimally as possible to ensure it will earn the love of the general public, not only the narrow sustainable bubble. GET looks and behaves maximally as the common toothpaste tube, while harnessing the advantages of reusable packaging, bringing the biggest possible change to the whole society.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager & Behavioural Scientist

profile_positions.description:
A family orthopedic company with 80 years of tradition, expanding its online business.
•	Led the development and execution of company rebrand and new website launch. Managed all aspects from market research to development of brand strategy and implementation of creative brand assets across the new website.
•	Key contributor for SEO and SEM, crafting fully Dutch ads with a 75% rise in the ad conversion rate.
•	Increased an average spend on the online shop by 20% and the monthly online traffic by 25%.
profile_positions.title: Digital Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
Social movement striving to awaken the community feeling in the region and stop the outflow of the human capital.

•	Fully accountable for the ATL & BTL communication, including brand development, customer research, PR, OOH and online strategy of the movement & connected festival celebrating community, music, theatre, art, and ecology.
•	Initiated and nurtured stakeholder relationships (governmental bodies, local municipalities, schools, community leaders, media, influencers, businesses, NGOs). 
•	Responsibility for project management, including setting up the grass-root movement, recruiting and managing a team of 15.
•	As a consequence of budget-effective and innovative marketing strategy, the event attracted 5 000 unique visitors and secured its long-term market position.
profile_positions.title: Head of Marketing, Founder

profile_positions.description:
The oldest & most prestigious Czech professional competition of business media.
•       The main touch-point for the business clients (IKEA, PwC, Mondelez, Nestlé, LEGO, Zasilkovna, Charles University, Czech Academy of Sciences).
•       Organised the gala event for 200+ marketing specialists.
•	Accountable for stakeholder management, including C-level management clients and top-professionals jury from fields of marketing, PR, design and journalism.
•	Key creator of content, e-mail and telephone marketing operating on a tight deadline manner.
•	Secured 30% annual application rate growth.
profile_positions.title: Product Marketer of the Zlatý Středník Competition

volunteer_experiences.description:
Program powered by Impact Hub Amsterdam. Developed a partnership communication & strategy manual for Bloei & Groei, the social enterprise helping Amsterdam women from marginalized communities to find their self-confidence and safe spot in society through connecting to nature. 

A short video about the project: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=puqBUwun8tU

Together with other AI members, we organized debates on the topic of human rights, feminism and climate opened both for Charles University students and the general public.

I have organised the Letter Writing Marathon in my hometown, Kolín, where more than 100 letters on support of unfairly prosecuted activists were written. The event attracted the attention of both local newspapers and TV.

The reportage from the event is here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=V46Dw3V1FUg

Organized a gala event & communication of the Living Lab program, where students connect with real-life challenges where they apply their skills equipped at the university. The Living Lab program is a unique example of a win-win situation, where the commercial companies around the campus find a solution to their environmental program and students gain experience before finishing their degree.
In Bepakt, the non-profit organisation focusing on zero waste, I am participating on the compact and comprehensive story telling and sustainable brand building.

An NGO dealing with financial literacy on a European level, cooperating with Erasmus+ projects, schools and businesses.

•	Responsible for the marketing strategy, ideas generating, copywriting, proofreading, popularizing the financial topics and addressing companies with the training proposals.


•	 Working in CEFIG I have realized how important the finances and the flow of investments are important for making a sustainable society grue. This is how my fascination with SDGs and sustainable financing has begun.
Reportage shooting, moderating, directing the radio campaigns, voiceover making for the cultural and commemorative events.
